mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUSINESS(MEMBERID, PWD, COMPANYNAME, NAME, COMADDRESS, ADDRESSDETAIL, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, AUTH, PHONENUM) VALUES(#{memberid}, #{pwd}, #{companyname}, #{name}, #{comaddress}, #{addressdetail}, #{filename}, #{newfilename}, 2, #{phonenum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BUSINESS WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberid} AND PWD = #{pwd}
mapper.select: SELECT a.APPLYSEQ, a.MEMBERID, a.JOBSEQ, a.RESUMESEQ, a.APPLYDATE, a.COMPANYREAD, r.RESUMETITLE, m.NAME, m.BIRTH, m.ADDRESS, m.DETAILADDRESS, m.PHONENUM, m.EMAIL FROM APPLY a, JOB j, RESUME r, MEMBER m WHERE a.JOBSEQ=j.JOBSEQ AND a.RESUMESEQ=r.RESUMESEQ AND a.MEMBERID=m.MEMBERID AND a.JOBSEQ=#{jobseq}
SELECT * FROM BUSINESS WHERE MEMBERID NOT IN('admin')
